name: The Business Trip - Indo-China Edition
description:
I fly a lot.  But what am I doing and why am I flying so much?  

Here’s your chance to find out as I take you along for a 6 day trip covering Cambodia, Laos & Vietnam in my capacity of joint-ceo of Bunnik Tours. 

Along they way I’ll show you a bit of beautiful Luang Prabang in Laos and the stately Vietnamese capital Hanoi.  And of course there are a few flights!  This vlog includes mini flight reviews on Angkor Air, Bangkok Airways and Vietnam Airlines.  

Let’s go!

Cheers

Dennis

Ps: here the link to that Thai Royal First Class review on the 747 I mentioned in the video. https://youtu.be/UkhbKJb1WiU

This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
